tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE credentials (
    credential_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    personnel_id INT,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    password VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (personnel_id) REFERENCES authorized_personnel(id)
);

CREATE TABLE door_access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    personnel_id INT,
    access_time TIMESTAMP,
    access_result VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (personnel_id) REFERENCES authorized_personnel(id)
);
